DISNEY FAMILY FILM - PETE'S DRAGON

Share

Recommend
Email
Print
Share
February 15, 2014

Program Locations:

New Dorp Library

When Pete, an orphan, and his best friend Elliot - an invisible green dragon - wander into the seaside village of Passamaquoddy, the townspeople think he's behind a slew of hilarious mishaps. But after a daring rescue , they change their tune and believe in Pete's fire-breathing buddy. Come watch this film on our big screen. Take home a free coloring sheet.
